Blonde

BLONDE

ABV

5%

IBU

18

VERY CLEAN ANDCRISP FLAVOR WITH A HINT OF CITRUS

Our blonde is made for the heat of Saigon. One crisp sip cuts through the stress of a long day. Blonde is very clean, very clear with a hint of citrus. This is not a lager, this is an ale with a lot of malt character. Rooster Blonde, the perfect all day drinker.
